attributes.action: Combine the English and Welsh Football Associations for the benefit of both countries
attributes.additional_details:
The English FA and the FA of Wales need to combine.

Both countries would benefit from a stronger national team and would have a better chance of winning a trophy.

There are already six Welsh teams in the current English FA league system and five English teams in the Welsh FA leagues.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_association_football_clubs_playing_in_the_league_of_another_country

There is precedent for this with the English and Welsh Cricket Board.

It is the logical step for the future of both national teams.

Let the Dragons and Lions roar together!

rejection.details: One for the respective associations to decide upon, not the Government.
